column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/8d643c90a6e0f1b69f23738701cb7a090870669c for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
